# Clarifai Docs

> Clarifai Docs

This file contains links to documentation sections following the llmstxt.org standard.

## Table of Contents

- [Agents](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/agents/README): Build powerful AI agents with Clarifai
- [Build Agents](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/agents/build): Learn how to build agents with Clarifai
- [MCP](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/agents/mcp): Build performant MCP Servers with FastMCP for Clarifai
- [Deployments](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/deployments/README): Orchestrate your AI workloads better, avoid vendor lock-in, and use compute spend efficiently
- [Supported Cloud Instances](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/deployments/cloud-instances): Learn about the instance types we support
- [Create Clusters and Nodepools](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/deployments/clusters-nodepools): Set up capabilities that match your computational needs
- [Deploy a Model](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/deployments/deploy-model): Deploy a model into your created cluster and nodepool
- [Manage Your Compute](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/deployments/manage-compute): Edit and delete deployments, clusters, and nodepools
- [Model Inference](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/inference/README): Perform predictions with models
- [Advanced Inference Options](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/inference/advanced): Learn how to use our advanced inference operations
- [Model Inference](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/inference/clarifai/README): Run inferences using Clarifai SDKs
- [Legacy Inference via API](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/inference/clarifai/api-legacy): Generate predictions using our older method
- [Inference via API](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/inference/clarifai/api): Generate predictions with models
- [Inference via UI](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/inference/clarifai/ui): Generate model or workflow predictions on the UI
- [LiteLLM](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/inference/litellm): Run inferences on Clarifai models using LiteLLM
- [OpenAI](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/inference/open-ai): Run inferences on Clarifai models using OpenAI
- [OpenHands](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/inference/openhands): Run inference with Clarifai models locally using OpenHands
- [Vercel AI SDK](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/inference/vercel): Run inferences on Clarifai models using Vercel
- [Local Runners](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/local-runners/README): Run and test models locally, while exposing them through Clarifai’s enterprise‑grade API
- [Hugging Face](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/local-runners/hf): Run Ollama models locally and make them available via a public API
- [Ollama](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/local-runners/ollama): Run Ollama models locally and make them available via a public API
- [Compute Orchestration](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/overview): Orchestrate your AI workloads better, avoid vendor lock-in, and use compute spend efficiently
- [Build and Upload Models](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/upload/README): Build and import models, including from external sources like Hugging Face
- [Input and Output Data Types](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/upload/data-types): Learn about supported input and output data types along with usage examples
- [Test Models Locally](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/compute/upload/test-locally): Learn how to test your locally built models
- [Authentication](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/control/authentication/README): Secure, compliant AI.
- [Authorize](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/control/authentication/authorize): Set up authentication to make API calls
- [App-Specific API Keys](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/control/authentication/key): Authenticate access to resources within the scope defined by the key
- [Personal Access Tokens](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/control/authentication/pat): Authenticate access to your own resources and those outside the scope of your apps
- [Scopes](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/control/authentication/scopes): Implement fine-grained control over the data that users have access to
- [Third-Party API Keys](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/control/authentication/third-party-api-keys): Learn about secrets for the Clarifai platform
- [Two-Factor Authentication](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/control/authentication/two-factor): Use 2FA to add an extra layer of security to your account
- [Clarifai Organizations](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/control/clarifai-organizations/README): Consolidate multiple accounts and enhance collaboration
- [Apps, Models, Workflows, & Compute](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/control/clarifai-organizations/apps-models-workflows): Create and manage apps, models, workflows, and dedicated compute
- [Members and Teams](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/control/clarifai-organizations/members-teams): Learn how to manage members and teams
- [Security](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/control/clarifai-organizations/security): Learn how to enhance the security of your Clarifai organization
- [Control Center](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/control/control-center/README): A unified interface for centralized visibility into your platform usage
- [Audit Logging via API](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/control/control-center/audit-log): Track what was performed, who did it, and the results
- [Costs & Budget Tab](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/control/control-center/costs): Get detailed financial data about your operations
- [Overview Tab](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/control/control-center/overview): Get a summary of your key metrics at a glance
- [Teams & Logs Tab](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/control/control-center/teams-logs): Gain insights into platform activities with enhanced visibility, security, and governance
- [Usage & Operations Tab](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/control/control-center/usage): Get detailed insights into your consumption of the Clarifai platform
- [Agent System Operators](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/agent-system-operators/README): Learn about our agent system operators
- [Aggregate](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/agent-system-operators/aggregate): Learn about our aggregate operators
- [Algorithmic Predict](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/agent-system-operators/algorithmic-predict): Learn about our algorithmic predict operators
- [Edit](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/agent-system-operators/edit): Learn about our edit operators
- [Embed](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/agent-system-operators/embed): Learn about our embed operators
- [Filter](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/agent-system-operators/filter): Learn about our filter operators
- [Map](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/agent-system-operators/map): Learn about our map operators
- [Prompter](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/agent-system-operators/prompter): Learn about our prompt operator
- [Push](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/agent-system-operators/push): Learn about our push operators
- [RAG Prompter](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/agent-system-operators/rag-prompter): Learn how to enhance the quality and relevance of LLM-generated text
- [Tracker](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/agent-system-operators/tracker): Learn about our tracker operators
- [Applications](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/applications/README): Create applications to work with AI resources on Clarifai
- [Apps Creation](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/applications/create): Learn how to create a Clarifai App
- [Apps Management](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/applications/manage): Learn how to manage your Clarifai applications
- [App Templates](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/applications/templates): Create applications faster with pre-built blueprints
- [Create and Manage Concepts](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/concepts/README): Manage your inputs and training data on the Community Platform
- [Concepts Relations](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/concepts/concepts-relations): Connect the knowledge gained by different models
- [Create Concepts](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/concepts/create): Learn how to create concepts within your app
- [Manage Concepts](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/concepts/manage): Learn how to get, update, and delete concepts
- [Datasets](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/datasets/README): Manage the datasets for training, testing, and evaluating your models
- [Datasets Creation](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/datasets/create): Learn how to create datasets and their versions
- [Dataset Annotation Filters](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/datasets/filters): Use filter and search functionality over your datasets
- [Datasets Management](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/datasets/manage): Use vector search to sort, rank, and retrieve images
- [Upload Data to Dataset via API](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/datasets/upload): Learn how to upload data to a dataset
- [Create and Manage Your Inputs](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/inputs/README): Manage your inputs and training data on the Community Platform
- [Manage Inputs via API](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/inputs/manage): Learn how to use our API to manage, organize, and process your inputs
- [Upload Inputs](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/inputs/upload/README): Add structured or unstructured data to the Clarifai platform
- [Upload via API](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/inputs/upload/api): Add data to the Clarifai platform via the API
- [Upload via UI](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/inputs/upload/ui): Add data to the Clarifai platform via the UI
- [Labeling](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/README): Assign relevant tags or keywords to inputs
- [Labeling via the API](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/api/README): Learn how to use our API to easily label your data
- [Delete Annotations](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/api/annotations-delete): Label your data.
- [List Annotations](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/api/annotations-list): Label your data.
- [Update Annotations](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/api/annotations-update): Label your data.
- [Create Annotations](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/api/annotations): Label your data.
- [Positive and Negative Annotations](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/api/positive-negative): Learn how to make positive and negative annotations
- [Tasks : Create, Get, Update, Delete](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/api/tasks): Group your labeling work into tasks that can be delegated.
- [Labeling via the UI](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/ui/README): Label inputs on the Inputs-Manager or Input-Viewer page
- [AI-Assisted Labeling](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/ui/ai-assist): Automatically generate annotations on Input-Viewer page
- [Bulk Labeling](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/ui/bulk): Label multiple inputs at once
- [Create Annotations](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/ui/create): Learn how to create annotations
- [Manage Annotations](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/ui/manage): Learn how to manage annotations
- [Object Tracking](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/ui/object-tracking): (Beta) Track people and objects in video
- [Labeling Tasks](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/ui/tasks/README): Label your data with tasks
- [Auto-Annotation](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/ui/tasks/auto): Learn how to automatically label inputs with ease
- [Create a Labeling Task](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/ui/tasks/create): Learn how to label a batch of data manually or with AI assistance
- [Positive and Negative Annotations](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/ui/tasks/positive-negative): Learn how to make positive and negative annotations
- [Review Annotations](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/ui/tasks/review): Review the work performed by your labelers
- [Labeling Tasks Tools](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/labeling/ui/tasks/tools): Learn about the labeling tools available in Scribe
- [Create and Train Models](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/README): Learn how to easily create and train new models
- [Deep Fine-Tuning](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/deep-fine-tuning/README): Learn how to fine-tune pre-trained models
- [Clusterer](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/deep-fine-tuning/clusterer): Learn about our clusterer model type
- [Text Classifier](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/deep-fine-tuning/text-classifier): Learn about our text classifier model type
- [Text Generation](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/deep-fine-tuning/text-to-text): Learn about our text-to-text model type and understand its fine-tuning process
- [Visual Anomaly](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/deep-fine-tuning/visual-anomaly): Learn about our visual anomaly  model type
- [Visual Classifier](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/deep-fine-tuning/visual-classifier): Learn how to create and train a visual classifier model
- [Visual Detector](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/deep-fine-tuning/visual-detector): Learn about our visual detector model type
- [Visual Embedder](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/deep-fine-tuning/visual-embedder): Learn about our visual embedder model type
- [Visual Segmenter](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/deep-fine-tuning/visual-segmenter): Learn about our visual segmenter model type
- [Evaluating Models](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/evaluate/README): Learn about our model evaluation feature
- [Evaluate via API](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/evaluate/api): Learn how to evaluate models via the API
- [Classification Models](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/evaluate/classification): Evaluate visual or text classifiers trained using deep fine-tuning
- [Visual Detection Models](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/evaluate/detection): Evaluate visual detection models
- [Evaluation Leaderboard](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/evaluate/leaderboard): Compare models' performance based on their evaluation results
- [LLM Evaluation](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/evaluate/llms): Evaluate your fine-tuned LLMs for text generation tasks
- [Visual Segmentation Models](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/evaluate/segmentation): Evaluate segmentation models
- [Transfer Learn Models](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/evaluate/transfer-learn): Evaluate visual or text classifiers trained using transfer learning
- [Model Export](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/export): Learn how to perform model export using Clarifai SDKs
- [Manage Models](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/manage): Learn how to get, update, search, and delete models
- [Create and Manage Model Versions](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/model-versions/README): Learn about model version tracking and management
- [Training Templates](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/templates/README): Learn about our deep fine-tuning template types
- [Advanced Config](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/templates/custom): Learn how to create your own custom deep fine-tuned template
- [Text Fine-Tuning Templates](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/templates/text): Learn about our text fine-tuning templates
- [Visual Classification Templates](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/templates/visual-classification): Learn about our visual classification templates
- [Visual Detection Templates](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/templates/visual-detection): Learn about our visual detection templates
- [Visual Embedding Templates](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/templates/visual-embedding): Learn about our visual embedding templates
- [Visual Segmenter Templates](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/templates/visual-segmentation): Learn about our visual segmenter templates
- [Transfer Learning](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/transfer-learning/README): Build upon pre-existing knowledge, streamline the learning process for novel tasks
- [Text Classifier](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/transfer-learning/text-classifier): Learn how to use transfer learning to create custom text classifier models
- [Visual Classifier](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/models/transfer-learning/visual-classifier): Learn how to use transfer learning to create custom visual classifier model
- [Modules](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/modules/README): Extend Clarifai’s UIs and perform customized backend processing
- [Create and Install Modules](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/modules/create-install): Learn how to create and install your modules
- [Modules Examples](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/modules/examples/README): Examples of popular modules
- [Collectors](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/modules/examples/collectors): Capture inputs used for making predictions in your app
- [Hyperparameter Sweeps](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/modules/examples/hyperparameter-sweeps): Learn about our hyperparameter sweeps module
- [OCR Evaluation Module](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/modules/examples/ocr-evaluation): Keep your credentials secure and build powerful modules
- [Manage Your Modules](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/modules/manage): Learn how to manage your modules
- [Environment Variables and Secrets](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/modules/secrets-management): Keep your credentials secure and build powerful modules
- [Vector Search](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/search/README): Leverage vector search capabilities to find similar items in a dataset
- [Search via the API](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/search/api/README): Use vector search to find, sort, and filter what you need in your unstructured data
- [Combine or Negate](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/search/api/combine-negate): Group or separate items in your search
- [Filter](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/search/api/filter): Select a subset of your data based on useful filters.
- [Rank](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/search/api/rank): Search your data based on concepts or visual similarity
- [Search via the UI](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/search/ui/README): Use vector search to find, sort, and filter what you need in your unstructured data
- [Combine or Negate](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/search/ui/combine-negate): Add or subtract items from your search query
- [Filter](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/search/ui/filter): Reduce noise by filtering out unwanted data
- [Object Search](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/search/ui/object): Use vector search to sort, rank, and retrieve annotated objects within images
- [Text Search](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/search/ui/text-search): Use vector search to sort, rank, and retrieve texts
- [Image Search](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/search/ui/visual): Use vector search to sort, rank, and retrieve images
- [Workflows](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/workflows/README): Combine multiple models and perform complex operations with workflows
- [Base Workflows](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/workflows/base-workflows): Index your data and provide your app with a default knowledge base
- [Create Workflows](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/workflows/create): Create computational graphs that include one or more models
- [Workflows Examples](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/workflows/examples/README): Learn how to build some common workflows on our platform
- [Auto-Annotation via API](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/workflows/examples/auto-annotation-api): Use AI to help you build AI. Auto annotation uses your model predictions to label your training data.
- [Auto-Annotation via UI](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/workflows/examples/auto-annotation-ui): Use AI to help you build AI. Auto annotation uses your model predictions to label your training data.
- [Custom KNN Face Classifier](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/workflows/examples/knn-classifier): Use facial recognition to identify individual people.
- [Custom Prompter Model](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/workflows/examples/prompter-model): Learn how to integrate a prompter model into an LLM workflow
- [YAML-based Examples](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/workflows/examples/yaml): Simple examples of workflows defined in YAML
- [Workflow Inferences](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/workflows/inference): Make predictions with your workflows
- [Manage Workflows](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/create/workflows/manage): Manage workflows
- [Deploy Your First Model](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/getting-started/first-deployment): Set up your computing infrastructure easily and fast for inference
- [Quick Start With Playground](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/getting-started/quickstart-playground): Start quickly with Clarifai Playground in a few simple steps
- [Quick Start With API](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/getting-started/quickstart): Start quickly with Clarifai API in a few simple steps
- [Set Up Compute Fast](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/getting-started/set-up-compute): Set up your computing infrastructure easily and fast for inference
- [Build and Upload a Model](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/getting-started/upload-model): Build and upload your first custom model to the Clarifai platform
- [DSPy-Clarifai Integration](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/DSPy/README): Learn about integrating Clarifai With DSPy
- [DSPy Modules & Signatures](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/DSPy/modules-signatures): Some core modules built in DSPy are as follows,
- [Multistage RAG Pipeline With DSPy](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/DSPy/multistage-dspy): import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
- [Building RAG with DSPy](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/DSPy/rag-dspy): import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
- [Integrating Clarifai With Databricks](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/databricks/README): Improve your data processing and analytics capabilities
- [Databricks-Connect Module](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/databricks/databricks-connect): Use a no-code interface to move data across Databricks and Clarifai
- [Fetch Annotations](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/databricks/fetch-annotations): Seamlessly retrieve annotations from Clarifai into Databricks
- [Fetch Data](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/databricks/fetch-data): Seamlessly retrieve your data from Clarifai into Databricks
- [Upload Data](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/databricks/upload-data): Seamlessly upload your data from Databricks into Clarifai
- [Integrating Clarifai With Embedchain](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/embedchain/README): Learn how to use Clarifai models in Embedchain
- [Using Clarifai LLMs And Models In Embedchain](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/embedchain/embedchain-tutorial): Using Clarifai models in Embedchain
- [Integrating Clarifai With LangChain](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/langchain/README): Learn about integrating Clarifai With LangChain
- [LLM Models](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/langchain/llm-models): Use LangChain to interact with Clarifai LLMs
- [Text Embeddings](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/langchain/text-embeddings): Use Clarifai and LangChain to create text embeddings
- [Vector Store](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/langchain/vector-store): Use Clarifai and LangChain to create a vector store and perform searches
- [Integrating Clarifai With LlamaIndex](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/llamaindex/README): Learn about integrating Clarifai With LlamaIndex
- [LLM Models](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/llamaindex/llm-models): Use LangChain to interact with Clarifai LLMs
- [Text Embeddings](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/llamaindex/text-embeddings): Use Clarifai and LlamaIndex to create text embeddings
- [Integrating Unstructred.io with Clarifai](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/unstructured/README): Learn how to use Unstructured along with Clarifai SDKs*
- [Data Ingestion Using Unstructured.io](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/unstructured/data-ingestion): Unstructured.io provides a powerful platform for handling the ingestion of unstructured data. Central to this process are the source and destinatio...
- [Chat With Dropbox Using Unstructured.io](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/unstructured/dropbox): import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
- [Use RAG With Unstructured.io](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/unstructured/s3-rag): import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
- [Ingest Email Messages From Salesforce Using Unstructured.io](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/integrations/unstructured/salesforce): Learn how to ingest email messages from Salesforce
- [Welcome](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/introduction): Orchestrate and customize AI workloads on any infrastructure, at the scale you need
- [Clarifai Releases and Update Types](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/product-updates/changelog/release-types): Learn about the different types of our releases
- [Release 10.0](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/product-updates/changelog/release100): Changelog for Clarifai Release 10.0

- [Upcoming Platform Changes](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/product-updates/upcoming-api-changes/README): Learn about scheduled changes to the Clarifai platform
- [Deprecation of `closed_environment` in favor of `enrich_dataset`](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/product-updates/upcoming-api-changes/closed-environment): Learn about deprecation of `closed_environment`
- [Updates to Model and Model Version Endpoints](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/product-updates/upcoming-api-changes/model-version-endpoints): Learn about updates to model and model version endpoints
- [Other Previous Completed Changes](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/product-updates/upcoming-api-changes/other-previous-changes): Learn about other previous completed changes
- [Changes to Use of PATs and API Keys](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/product-updates/upcoming-api-changes/pat-api-keys): Learn about breaking changes to the use of PATs and API keys
- [Changes to PostModelOutputs and PostWorkflowResults Responses](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/product-updates/upcoming-api-changes/postmodeloutputs-responses): Learn about changes to PostModelOutputs and PostWorkflowResults responses
- [Enabling Secure Data Hosting](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/product-updates/upcoming-api-changes/secure-data-hosting): Learn about how to use SDH to download inputs securely
- [Changes to Workflow Builder Model IDs](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/product-updates/upcoming-api-changes/workflow-builder-ids): Learn about changes to the workflow builder model IDs

- [API Outputs](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/api-overview/api-outputs): Understand Clarifai’s API responses
- [Clarifai CLI](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/api-overview/cli): Learn how to use the Clarifai Command Line Interface (CLI)
- [gRPC API Clients](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/api-overview/grpc-clients): Clarifai API provides gRPC clients in the most popular languages
- [Node.js SDK](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/api-overview/nodejs-sdk): Discover the power of the Node.js SDK
- [Pagination](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/api-overview/pagination): Learn how to paginate your GET or POST requests
- [Python SDK](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/api-overview/python-sdk): Discover the power of the Python SDK
- [Rate Limits](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/api-overview/rate-limits): Learn about our API rate limits
- [Status Codes](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/api-overview/status-codes): Understand Clarifai error codes

- [Complementary Topics](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/complementary-topics/README): Learn about advanced capabilities in our platform
- [Batch Predict CSV on Custom Text Model](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/complementary-topics/batch-predict-csv): Enjoy the convenience of working with CSV files and text.
- [Import Data with CSV and TSV Files](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/complementary-topics/csv-tsv): Enjoy the convenience of working with spreadsheet data
- [Intelligent Document Processing](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/complementary-topics/intelligent-document-processing): Capture information from an organization's form that are stored as PDF documents
- [Patching](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/complementary-topics/patching): Patch data in your applications.
- [Build RAG Apps](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/complementary-topics/rag): Learn how to use the Clarifai SDKs
- [Data Utils](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/data-utils/README): Learn how to use the Clarifai Data Utils library
- [Image Annotation Loader](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/data-utils/image-annotation-loader): Load existing annotated image datasets and convert between supported formats
- [Data Ingestion Pipelines](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/data-utils/ingestion-pipelines): Pre-process and ingest diverse data formats, including images and text-based documents
- [General AI Glossary](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/glossary/README): A Glossary of General AI Terms for Using the Clarifai Platform Effectively
- [Generative AI Glossary](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/glossary/generative-ai): A Glossary of Generative AI Terms for Using the Clarifai Platform Effectively
- [Clarifai Platform Overview](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/platform/README): Your platform for the entire AI lifecycle
- [Data Privacy and Security](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/privacy-security): Learn how we secure and handle your data
- [Python SDK Notebook Examples](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/sdk-examples): Learn how to use the Clarifai SDKs
- [Additional Tips](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/tips): Enhance your implementation with Clarifai
- [Troubleshooting](https://docs.clarifai.com/docs/resources/troubleshooting): Common issues and solutions
